institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Global Job Support Business Rules/Article 11 (Support Organization)
contents: Article 11 (Support Organization) ① The Chairman may establish a non-permanent organization for global job support in the Corporation in order to resolve youth unemployment through qualitative improvement and revitalization of global job support and to foster human resources that will lead global economic activities in the future. , ② The non-permanent organization in paragraph 1 shall be the Global Job Support Committee. ③ The Global Job Support Committee (hereinafter referred to as the *Support Committee) is composed of up to 15 members (hereinafter referred to as *Support Committee members) including a chairperson (hereinafter referred to as *Support Committee Chairperson), and the support committee chairperson is the Director of the International Human Resources Development Center of the Corporation. ④ Support members are appointed by the chairman from among those engaged in work related to the following items, and the term of office is two years. However, the term of office of the officials listed in item 1 will be suspended if their positions are changed. 1. Officials of government ministries, local governments, public enterprises, and quasi-governmental organizations related to global job support (hereinafter referred to as *related organizations), 2. Academia, Industry and labor experts; 3. Corporation executives or employees; 4. Persons recommended by the chairman among institutional officials engaged in global job support-related projects; ⑤ The support committee deliberates, presents opinions, and provides advice on the following tasks. 1. Presentation of opinions on the annual business plan, 2. Deliberation on the criteria and methods for selecting operating organizations to participate in the global job support project, 3. Presentation of opinions on mid- to long-term business plans to revitalize the business, 4. Deliberation and advice on other matters submitted by the Chairman of the Board of Directors, ⑥ The Support Committee meeting is convened by the Chairman of the Board or the Chairman of the Support Committee, is established with the attendance of a majority of the current members of the Support Committee, and is resolved with the approval of a majority of the members present. ⑦ The Chairman of the Board of Directors shall meet in Paragraph 3. Active efforts must be made to ensure that matters related to deliberation, opinion presentation, and advice are reflected in the project.
